import { ApiService } from './../../services/api/api.service';
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import { NavParams } from '@ionic/angular';
import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms';
import { ModalController, LoadingController } from '@ionic/angular';
import { IExpense } from 'src/app/interface/dto';
import { ErrorMessages } from './../../pages/validation';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-details',
  templateUrl: './details.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./details.component.scss'],
})
export class DetailsComponent implements OnInit {

  expense: IExpense;
  editExpenseForm: FormGroup;
  categories: Array<string>;
  budgetId: string;
  edit = false;
  errorMessage = ErrorMessages.editExpenseError;

  constructor(
    private navParams: NavParams,
    private formBuilder: FormBuilder,
    private modalCtrl: ModalController,
    public loadingController: LoadingController,
    private api: ApiService
  ) {
    this.categories = ['Health', 'Food', 'Education', 'Transport', 'Entertainment', 'Shopping', 'Others'];
    this.expense = this.navParams.get('expense');
    this.budgetId = this.navParams.get('id');
  }

  ngOnInit() {
    this.initForm();
  }

  initForm() {
    this.editExpenseForm = this.formBuilder.group({
      date: ['', Validators.compose([
        Validators.required,
      ])],
      amount: [, Validators.compose([
        Validators.required,
        Validators.pattern('^[0-9]+(\.[0-9]{1,2})?$')
      ])],
      category: ['', Validators.compose([
        Validators.required
      ])],
      descr: ['', Validators.compose([
        Validators.required,
      ])],
      remark: [''],
    });
    this.editExpenseForm.controls.date.setValue(this.expense.date);
    this.editExpenseForm.controls.amount.setValue(this.expense.amount);
    this.editExpenseForm.controls.category.setValue(this.expense.category);
    this.editExpenseForm.controls.descr.setValue(this.expense.descr);
    this.editExpenseForm.controls.remark.setValue(this.expense.remark);
  }

  toggleEdit() {
    this.edit = !this.edit;
    // if (this.edit) {
    //   this.editExpenseForm.enable();
    // } else {
    //   this.editExpenseForm.disable();
    // }
  }

  async onSubmit(value) {
    const loading = await this.loadingController.create({
      translucent: false,
      backdropDismiss: false
    });
    await loading.present();
    value.icon = this.expense.icon;
    this.api.editExpense(value, this.budgetId, this.expense._id).then(() => {
      this.editExpenseForm.reset();
      loading.dismiss();
      this.modalCtrl.dismiss();
    }).catch((e) => {
      console.log(e);
      loading.dismiss();
    });
  }

  dismiss() {
    this.modalCtrl.dismiss({
      dismissed: true
    });
  }
}

<ion-content class="ion-padding">
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-buttons slot="end">
      <ion-button (click)="toggleEdit()">
        <ion-icon slot="icon-only" size="large" name="create"></ion-icon>
      </ion-button>
      <ion-button (click)="dismiss()">
        <ion-icon slot="icon-only" size="large" name="close-circle"></ion-icon>
      </ion-button>
    </ion-buttons>
  </ion-toolbar>

  <img src="assets/images/wallet.svg">
  <div class="text" *ngIf="edit">Edit Expense</div>
  <div class="text" *ngIf="!edit">Expense</div>

  <form [formGroup]="editExpenseForm" (ngSubmit)="onSubmit(editExpenseForm.value)">
    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="floating">Date</ion-label>
      <!-- <ion-input type="text" formControlName="date"></ion-input> -->
      <ion-datetime displayFormat="D MMM YYYY H:mm" min="2020" max="2022" formControlName="date"></ion-datetime>
    </ion-item>
    <div class="validation-errors">
      <ng-container *ngFor="let validation of errorMessage.date">
        <div class="error-message"
          *ngIf="editExpenseForm.get('date').hasError(validation.type) && (editExpenseForm.get('date').dirty || editExpenseForm.get('date').touched)">
          <ion-icon name="information-circle-outline"></ion-icon> {{ validation.message }}
        </div>
      </ng-container>
    </div>

    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="floating">Amount</ion-label>
      <ion-input type="number" inputmode="numeric" placeholder="N" formControlName="amount"></ion-input>
    </ion-item>
    <div class="validation-errors">
      <ng-container *ngFor="let validation of errorMessage.amount">
        <div class="error-message"
          *ngIf="editExpenseForm.get('amount').hasError(validation.type) && (editExpenseForm.get('amount').dirty || editExpenseForm.get('amount').touched)">
          <ion-icon name="information-circle-outline"></ion-icon> {{ validation.message }}
        </div>
      </ng-container>
    </div>

    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="floating">Category</ion-label>
      <ion-select formControlName="category" cancelText="Cancel" okText="OK">
        <ion-select-option *ngFor="let cat of categories" [value]="cat">{{cat}}</ion-select-option>
      </ion-select>
    </ion-item>

    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="floating">Description</ion-label>
      <ion-input type="text" formControlName="descr"></ion-input>
    </ion-item>
    <div class="validation-errors">
      <ng-container *ngFor="let validation of errorMessage.descr">
        <div class="error-message"
          *ngIf="editExpenseForm.get('descr').hasError(validation.type) && (editExpenseForm.get('descr').dirty || editExpenseForm.get('descr').touched)">
          <ion-icon name="information-circle-outline"></ion-icon> {{ validation.message }}
        </div>
      </ng-container>
    </div>

    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="floating">Remarks</ion-label>
      <ion-input type="text" formControlName="remark"></ion-input>
    </ion-item>

    <ion-button color="primary" class="ion-margin-top" expand="full" type="submit" *ngIf="edit">
      Update</ion-button>
  </form>
</ion-content>

    ion-toolbar {
        --background: transparent;

        margin-bottom: 24px;
        z-index: 10;

        margin-top: 24px;
        border-radius: 10px;
        --background: #e1f3f3;
        opacity: 0.8;
        z-index: 1000;
    }

    .error-message {
        color: red;
        font-size: 14px;
        margin-left: 10px;
        margin-top: 10px;
    }

    ion-button {
        margin-top: 24px;
    }
}
